name: Todo App Development Roadmap
description: Development roadmap for React Todo application with localStorage persistence

tasks.title: Implement task creation functionality
tasks.notes: Core functionality to create new tasks with title, description, priority, and due date

tasks.title: Implement task list display and management
tasks.notes: Display tasks in a list with ability to manage them

tasks.title: Implement task filtering and search
tasks.notes: Allow filtering and searching tasks by various criteria

tasks.title: Implement task editing functionality
tasks.notes: Allow users to edit existing tasks

tasks.title: Implement light/dark theme toggle
tasks.notes: Add ability to switch between light and dark themes

tasks.title: Implement task deletion functionality
tasks.notes: Allow users to delete tasks with confirmation

tasks.title: Implement localStorage persistence
tasks.notes: Save and load all data to/from localStorage
